meanings.sent1: The tiny insect was imperceivable to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The imperceivable sound of a pin dropping echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent3: The imperceivable ninja moved swiftly and silently through the shadows.
meanings.sent4: The imperceivable scent of fresh flowers filled the air, though no blooms were in sight.
meanings.sent5: The imperceivable details in the painting could only be seen under a magnifying glass.

meanings.definition: Not able to be noticed or recognized.
meanings.sent1: Her imperceivable smile hid her true feelings from everyone.
meanings.sent2: The imperceivable changes in the landscape went unnoticed by most travelers.
meanings.sent3: The imperceivable typo in the email caused a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: His imperceivable talent for mimicry made him the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The imperceivable differences between the twins were only noticeable to their parents.
